answers.answer: Your baby will be healthy as long as you take care of yourself :) some women fail the glucose test and then go to take the more extensive test and pass with flying colors. Try not to stress :)

I passed my glucose test, but I got told I'm anemic too, I just have to take a extra iron vitamin once a day... you will be fine just once the doctor does the 3hr glucose test if you didn't pass you would have to go on some type of diet, don't stress you will be ok♡ congrats on your pregnancy!

question: Im 27weeks 2 days and i just got a call from my doctor with the diabetes blood test result. She said i came out one number high and yhat she need to do a more extended test plus i came out anemic and have to take iron. I just feel scared i want my baby to be healthy :(
title: scared
